name: Linux LiveCD Information File
summary: Learn about .DISKDEFINES files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Linux installation programs and system utilities may reference this file during setup to verify disc contents or provide guidance to the user. It is not an executable file and does not directly affect the installation process, but it serves as a helpful reference for users and automated scripts.

instructions: You can open DISKDEFINES files with any text editor since the files store plain text. Several options include Microsoft Notepad (Windows) and Apple TextEdit (macOS).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
